text:
Hey Everyone,

I am trying to use HubSpot APIs from Java backend and found that currently there are no Official Java Clients available, can you suggest how to proceed here?
Any help is much appreciated.

Thanks!

Hey, I have a problem with metadata (description and featured image) from a dynamic page built with huBdb data not showing up on social media posts. I tried fb debugg tool and it says the link doesn't have a og:image tag..
Have you checked the HubDB table settings to see if meta description and featured image fields are binded to the correct columns?

Morning all, anyone else experiencing delays with executing custom code actions? Event doesn't give enough info to tell me if it's code struggling to execute or some form of HubSpot outage. It succeeds with some records, gets permanently stuck with others.

Will chat with support regardless, just curious what others are experiencing

Hi everyone, we are having problems with our Salesforce HubSpot integration. We currently use multiple lead records for the same people based on actions and occasionally have both a lead and contact record for the same person. HubSpot doesn't work well with that situation. Anybody else work through this issue? <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Marketing-Integrations/Salesforce-HubSpot-Integration-How-to-Handle-Multiple-Leads-and/td-p/684488>
:wave: Hi everyone!
Good morning!

Not sure about the others but you can just turn jquery off
settings -> website -> pages - > templates

Hello - has anyone experienced any issues with tracking when activating secure cookies in tracking?
I’d like to enable this. I just need to make sure that setting cookies to secure doesn’t invalidate any existing cookies set for website users

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/reports/set-up-sources-tracking#use-secure-cookies>

Sounds like someone else in your portal made a custom object?
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/crm-setup/use-custom-objects>
No custom objects start with 2- not 0-. 0- are HubSpot objects
Ah my mistake no idea then
Hello All, I am having an issue with some a:hover CSS not displaying on my CTA when embedded on a page, but it is showing up properly when in the preview section of HubSpot.
Any help is greatly appreciated! <https://sebeta.wpengine.com/form-test-page/>

Hi all, I'm trying to find out if it's possible to remove all activity & attachments from the contacts database while retaining the contacts themselves. Didn't find any solutions on knowledge base but maybe it's possible to do via API? Appreciate any help :)
You could technically do this through a custom form and then submit the signature as an attachment.
Do you want to keep email interaction and stuff?
If not you could GDPR delete the contact and then recreate them

Hey all, our marketing team raised an issue with our website showing a bunch pages with the URLs params like `?hs_amp=true`  and `?_ga=` appended to the URL, is anywhere in HubSpot that we could stop pages being generated like that? Thanks.

Sorry, I was on vacation ..
It's not what I mean - I also read this article before :)
Anyway, thanks for the answer :)
